frame_types.service_initiation: Initial service frame establishment in dialogue opening
frame_types.journey_information: Information collection frame for travel details
frame_types.origin_inquiry: Frame for inquiring about departure location
frame_types.origin_uncertainty: Frame reflecting customer uncertainty about departure options
frame_types.passenger_information: Frame for passenger number and details
frame_types.time_preference: Frame for departure time preference elicitation
frame_types.ticket_selection: Frame for making ticket choice decision
frame_types.customer_identification: Frame for collecting customer identification details
frame_types.farewell: Closing frame initiated by service provider

strategy_types.frame_expansion: Strategy that extends existing frames with additional elements
strategy_types.frame_shift: Strategy that redirects dialogue to different frame
strategy_types.frame_acceptance: Strategy that signals acceptance of proposed frame
strategy_types.frame_challenge: Strategy that challenges or questions current frame
strategy_types.frame_transition: Strategy that signals movement between frames
strategy_types.frame_element_rejection: Strategy that rejects specific elements within frame
